details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.3.3 Composite fonts - CMaps
details.description: All CMaps used within a conforming file, except Identity-H and Identity-V, shall be embedded in that file as described in PDF Reference 5.6.4

rule.description: All CMaps used within a conforming file, except Identity-H and Identity-V, shall be embedded in that file as described in PDF Reference 5.6.4

error.message: A CMap is different from "Identity-H" or "Identity-V" and is not embedded
